title: Remove authenticated footer attribution and add subtle login attribution under logo

requirements.summary: Remove the authenticated app layout footer attribution so it no longer renders (including ICP credit line and logo).
acceptanceCriteria: No footer credit/attribution content is visible anywhere in the app layout footer area after login
The “Powered by Internet Computer” text and ICP logo are not displayed in the UI footer area

file_operations.description: Stop rendering the footer attribution in the authenticated app layout by removing the AppFooter import and the <AppFooter /> usage so no footer attribution content appears after login.
Delete the footer attribution component containing the CloseCircle credits and the “Powered by Internet Computer” line + ICP logo to ensure it cannot be rendered anywhere.

requirements.summary: Add a small muted “Built by Abel Odoh” line directly under the CloseCircle title on the login screen.
acceptanceCriteria: On the login screen, a new line “Built by Abel Odoh” appears directly below the “CloseCircle” title
The attribution line is visually smaller than the title and uses a subdued/muted style

file_operations.description: Under the existing login branding title (APP_NAME / “CloseCircle”), render a new secondary-text line reading exactly “Built by Abel Odoh”, styled smaller with muted/subtle typography so it reads as understated attribution.
